content: उपदृश् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> To see, behold, look at, perceive. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} To be or become visible. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to see, show or exhibit. {@--2@} To place before, show up, communicate, make (one) acquainted (with); राज्ञः पुरो मामुपदर्श्य <ls>H. 3</ls>; नयविद्भिर्नवे राज्ञि सदसच्चोपदर्शितं <ls>R. 4. 10.</ls> {@--3@} To present a false appearance, deceive a person by a false appearance, illude. {@--4@} To explain, illustrate; <ls>Y. 2. 8.</ls>
उपदृश् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Seeing, witnessing (as the sun and the moon). {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} Aspect, view (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
